edits.summary: Refactored single-file React UI with typed data/constants and stable handlers while preserving preview and UX.
Refactored FolderInteraction mockup with typed layouts, motion/config constants, and reusable skeleton blocks while keeping UI/preview unchanged.
Reorganized app.tsx into section components with guarded helpers and centralized tokens while maintaining existing UI and canvas preview.
Isolated browser-specific actions behind a platform bridge and tightened observers for RN readiness while keeping the UI/preview unchanged.
Hardened app.tsx with typed categories, centralized lookups, guarded browser actions, and stabilized gallery/responsive behavior while keeping the single-file UI and canvas preview unchanged.
